alert.note: Alert for Southern Seward Peninsula Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Warning issued September 19 at 2:16AM AKDT until September 19 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Significant coastal flooding expected. * WHERE...Southern Seward Peninsula Coast. * WHEN...Until 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads may be closed. Low lying property including homes, businesses, the airport, and other critical infrastructure will be inundated. Some shoreline erosion will occur. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Water levels will slowly fall through 10 AM Monday morning as the low weakens near Cape Lisburne.
info.instruction: Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. If travel is required, do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth.
